meanings.definition: Present participle of hat: to cover the head with a hat
meanings.sent1: She is hatting herself before going out in the sun.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys hatting his head with a baseball cap.
meanings.sent3: The cat is hatting itself with a tiny doll hat.
meanings.sent4: The tree is hatting its top with a canopy of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The scarecrow is hatting its head to scare away birds.

meanings.definition: Present participle of hat: to provide with a hat
meanings.sent1: The store is hatting all the mannequins for the display.
meanings.sent2: She is hatting her friends with matching beanies.
meanings.sent3: The robot is hatting all the visitors with colorful caps.
meanings.sent4: The magician is hatting the audience with magical top hats.
meanings.sent5: The stylist is hatting the models with trendy headwear.
